sample.name: Bash
description: Bash the enemy with your weapon, dealing {value1} damage. After bashing enemies 4 times, your next Bash will clobber, Stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds. Clobber twice as often while using a Two-Handed weapon.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Clobbering an enemy grants you 20% Maximum Life as Fortify.

runes.name: Battle
description: Clobbering an enemy generates an additional 10 Fury.

runes.name: Combat
description: After Critically Striking 4 times with Bash using a Two-Handed weapon, your next Core or Weapon Mastery Skill will Overpower.

sample.name: Accelerating Aspect
sample.description: Critical Strikes with Core Skills increase your Attack Speed by + [10-30%] for 5 seconds.

sample.name: 100,000 Steps
secondary_stats: Evade Grants 10% Attack Speed for 3 Seconds
terciary_stats: Movement Speed per Walking Arsenal Bonus
terciary_stats__full: [5-7]% Movement Speed per Walking Arsenal Bonus
sample.effect: When activating or refreshing the full Walking Arsenal Key Passive effect, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain [50-100] Fury. Can only occur once every 5 seconds.
sample.flavor: "While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home." - A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos

sample.name: Ambidextrous
bonus: Grants + {value} bonus to all Magic nodes within range.
additional_bonus: You deal x8% increased damage while Weilding One-Handed Weapons.

sample.name: Cluster Munitions
sample.description: Lucky Hit: You have up to a 20% chance to launch 6 Stun Grenades that deal [X] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 0.50 seconds.

sample.name: Anticipation
sample.description: Your Ultimate Skills gain 20% Cooldown Reduction. Your Ultimate Skills gain 12% increased damage for each nearby enemy affected by your Damage Over Time effects.

sample.name: Autodefense
sample.location: Acquired by defeating Heralds in Arcane Tremors
description: The Seneschal Construct activates an antimaterial field around itself shooting down up to 30 enemy projectiles. Lasts for 5 seconds. Can not shoot down Boss or Player projectiles.
